roleset_name: sew with close stiches that pass over both edges being attached

roles.descr: entity causing two objects to be attached
roles.descr_trans: 导致两个对象相连的实体

roles.descr_trans: 正在缝制的东西，如果它们是分开的，则为第一块

roleset_name_trans: 用紧密的针迹缝合，穿过所连接的两个边缘
